description: Eco Bristo Limited, launched in 2022, is an agritech platform focused on sustainable pest management solutions using solar power. The company has developed a solar-powered insect trap specifically designed to eradicate the false coddling moth, a significant pest affecting avocado crops. By collaborating with farmers, Eco Bristo aims to enhance agricultural productivity while promoting environmentally friendly practices, ultimately improving food systems in Kenya and beyond.
name: Eco Bristo
